com.foreach.across.modules.dynamicforms.domain.document

Class DynamicDocumentService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.dynamicforms.domain.document.DynamicDocumentService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicDocumentWorkspaceFactory

    @Service
public class DynamicDocumentService
extends Object
implements DynamicDocumentWorkspaceFactory
    Central service for creating DynamicDocumentWorkspace objects. The latter is the main component for working with DynamicDocument data.

    This is the default implementation of DynamicDocumentWorkspaceFactory where a new workspace is created with its own optional definition cache. If you want to create several separate workspaces in a single thread, it is often better to create a separate DynamicDocumentWorkspaceFactory that uses a shared cache. You can do so with the createCachingDocumentWorkspaceFactory() methods.

    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    DynamicDocumentWorkspace, DynamicDocumentWorkspaceFactory

      • createCachingDocumentWorkspaceFactory

        public CachingDynamicDocumentWorkspaceFactory createCachingDocumentWorkspaceFactory()
        Create a new workspace factory with a new shared cache for parsed definitions. All workspaces created from the factory will use the same cache for retrieving the actual definitions.

        The default cache is an empty ConcurrentHashMap which is safe to use across multiple threads.

        Returns:
        workspace factory instance

      • createCachingDocumentWorkspaceFactory

        public CachingDynamicDocumentWorkspaceFactory createCachingDocumentWorkspaceFactory(@NonNull
                                                                                    @NonNull Map<Long,DynamicDocumentDefinition> definitionCache)
        Create a new workspace factory using the specified cache for storing and retrieving defintiions. All workspaces created from the factory will use the specified cache.
        Parameters:
        definitionCache - to use
        Returns:
        workspace factory instance
